content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I’m here to help you with any plumbing, electrical, or HVAC issues. Can I get your name to get started?
It’s Dan. Actually, do you mind holding off? I think I’m going to try to fix the leak myself and see how it goes.
Of course, Dan. If you need any assistance or change your mind, feel free to reach back out. Good luck with your repair!
reason: Customer decided to try fixing the issue themselves.
